editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-6v: Prayer, “For the sake of peaceful holy things,”Bä’ǝntä Qǝdsat, በእንተ፡ ቅድሳት፡ ሰላማዊት፡. MQ 26 –9; MG 41ff.; Liturgy 33 –7. F and passim, mention the owner, ኃይለ ሥላሴ. F-8v: Prayer, በሰማይ የሀሉ ልብክሙ, from the Anaphora of Our Lord. F-17v: Prayer, እግዚአብሔር ዘብርሃናት. F-19v: Prayer, ፍትሐተ ማይ. F-34r: Prayer, ነአኵተከ አምላክ ቅዱስ, from the Anaphora of Our Lord with the remainder of the Anaphora. F-39v: Prayer, Praise of the Beloved for Mary, from Horologium for the Night Hours. F-42v: Prayer, Praise of the Beloved for Mary and her Son Together. F-66r: Chants called Kǝśtät, ክሥተት፡. Arranged for the days of the week: Wednesday (), Thursday (), Friday (), Saturday (). F-72v: Asmat prayer spoken to Andrew, EMIP 247. Incipit: በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ . . . ጸሎት፡ ዘተናገሮ፡ ለእንደርያስ፡ ሐዋርያ፡ ጸሎቱ፡ . . . mentions the scribe, ኃይለ ማርያም. has a pen trail in form of a prayer, "Bless my pen; make it a good writing pen."

origin.origDate: F. 2r mentions Metropolitan ዮሐንስ and Bishop of Alexandria, ቄርሎስ. F. 4r mentions Haile Selassie

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
